name: Five Nights at the Frosty Mart
name_original: Five Nights at the Frosty Mart
description:
(DISCLAIMER: This game is meant to parody a lot of my older works, which is why I made it intentionally bad.)

This game is about Kyle getting asked by Lenny to work at the Frosty Mart because Fanboy and ChumChum are acting a little strange.

Kyle goes to work for as long as eternity...

All you gotta do in this game is look around, check the cameras, and fend off Fanboy and ChumChum by using your magic. If you fail to do it then they give you a brain freeze.

Controls:

Mouse
